import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update multiple rooms"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/rooms/update/batch"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates multiple rooms in a single batch operation. Each entry must include `LocationRoomId`, allowing bulk updates for capacity, status, or naming changes.

**Prerequisites**
1. **LocationRoomId list** - Use [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/query](/docs/api/locations/query-location-rooms) and extract `Items[].LocationRoomId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Query rooms to collect IDs.
2. Build an array of `UpdateLocationRoomRequest` objects with updated fields.
3. Submit: [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/update/batch](/docs/api/locations/update-location-rooms-batch).

**Minimal Required Fields**: Each item must include `LocationRoomId` plus at least one field to update.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication"},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Request model for creating or updating a location room. Extends LocationRoom with additional update options.","properties":{"LocationRoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Unique identifier for the room. Required for updates, null for creates."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site/district this room belongs to"},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Parent location (building/school) containing this room","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getMyLocationsV2","endpoint":"GET /api/v2.0/locations","responseField":"Items[].LocationId"}},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Room name or number (e.g., 'Room 101', 'Main Office')"},"Number":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Room number identifier"},"LocationRoomTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the room type classification"},"LocationRoomStatusTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the room's current status"},"Area":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Room area in square feet"},"SeatingCapacity":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Number of seats available in the room"},"MaximumOccupancy":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Maximum number of people allowed in the room"},"PrimaryPhotoId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Reference to the primary photo file for this room"},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Detailed description of the room"},"InternalNotes":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Internal notes about the room (not visible to end users)"},"IsAvailable":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the room is available for internal reservations"},"IsExternallyAvailable":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the room is available for external/community reservations"},"LeadTimeThreshold":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Minimum lead time required before reserving this room"},"LeadTimeThresholdUnit":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Unit for lead time threshold","enum":["Hours","Days","Weeks"]},"IsDuplicateRequest":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if this is a duplicate/clone values","default":false},"CustomFieldValues":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"Custom field value assigned to a location room. >
  
</RequestSchema>
